title: make conflicting URL message useful
body:
ATM after running
```
datalad --dbg create-sibling --shared all --existing=skip -r ssh://datasets.datalad.org/srv/datasets.datalad.org/www/ datalad-public
```
and waiting for a while I just get an exception with a message listing all datasets where url somehow is conflicting
```
RuntimeError: Sibling 'datalad-public' already exists with conflicting URL for 20 dataset(s). [u'crawl/crcns/alm-3', u'crawl/crcns/am-3', u'crawl/crcns/cai-3', u'crawl/crcns/hc-7', u'crawl/crcns/hc-8', u'crawl/crcns/mgsm-1', u'crawl/crcns/pvc-11', u'crawl/crcns/ssc-4', u'crawl/crcns/tes-1', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-2', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-3', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-4', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-5', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-6', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-7', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-8', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-9', u'crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014', u'crawl/openfmri/ds000210']
```
I have no clue how/why any of those is conflicting.  It would be nice to include in the message detail per each dataset , because upon a quick check I see no conflict whatsoever!
